dmca.title: DegreeAdvantage says text copying is unfair advantage
dmca.body:
The following communication is to request the immediate removal of http://www.usaeducate.com from your search engine. The aforementioned website is in blatant violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the website http://www.degreeadvantage.com, in it entirety.

2. The offending website is http://www.usaeducate.com. The offending website has, without permission, copied - from what we can tell - in its entirety, including website design, logos, image files, proprietary links, text and code, our website, http://www.degreeadvantage.com.

* Please compare the following pages:

http://www.degreeadvantage.com (homepage of work at issue) http://www.usaeducate.com (homepage of offending website)

* If any additional proof is needed I have taken screen shots of the offending material and can email them to you upon request.

* Again, http://www.usaeducate.com is an unauthorized carbon copy of our entire website including website design, logos, images files, propriety links, text content and code.

3. Contact information for offending website [private]@yahoo.com or [private]@usaeducate.com.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
A notification following the removal http://www.usaeducate.com from your search engine would be greatly appreciated.

Sincerely,

[signed]

[private]
DegreeAdvantage.com

[private]
Sandy, Utah 84092
Ph: [private]
Email: [private]@careeradvantage.org
